comment: Iran is talking very boldly about targeting certain USA assets as revenge for our ridding the world of their terrorist leader who had just killed an American , & badly wounded many others , not to mention all of the people he had killed over his lifetime , including recently ...
amr:
# ::snt Iran is talking very boldly about targeting certain USA assets as revenge for our ridding the world of their terrorist leader who had just killed an American , & badly wounded many others , not to mention all of the people he had killed over his lifetime , including recently ...
(t / talk-01
      :ARG0 (c / country
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Iran"))
      :ARG1 (t2 / target-01
            :ARG0 c
            :ARG1 (a / asset
                  :mod (c2 / certain)
                  :mod (c3 / country
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "USA")))
            :purpose (r / revenge
                  :beneficiary (r2 / ridding-01
                        :ARG0 (w / we)
                        :ARG1 (w2 / world)
                        :ARG2 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (l / lead-02
                                    :ARG1 (t3 / terrorist))
                              :ARG0-of (k / kill-01
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / person
                                          :mod (c4 / country
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "America")))
                                    :mod (j / just))
                              :ARG0-of (w3 / wound-01
                                    :ARG1 (p3 / person
                                          :mod (o / other
                                                :quant (m / many))
                                          :ARG1-of (b / bad-05)))
                              :ARG2-of (m2 / mention-01
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG1 (p4 / person
                                          :mod (a2 / all)
                                          :ARG1-of (k2 / kill-01
                                                :ARG0 p
                                                :time (l2 / lifetime
                                                      :poss p)
                                                :ARG2-of (ii / include-91
                                                      :ARG1 (r3 / recent)))))))))
      :ARG1-of (b2 / bold-02
            :degree (v / very)))

            :op1 (a2 / attack-01

                        :poss (w / we))
                  :time (a3 / already))

                  :ARG1 (h2 / hit-01

                        :mod (a4 / additional))))
      :snt3 (p4 / problem
            :domain (c2 / country

                        :op1 "Iran"))
            :mod (n3 / nothing-but)
            :duration (m3 / many

                        :unit (y / year))))
      :snt4 (l2 / let-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (s / serve-01

                                                :op1 "Iran")))
                              :ARG2 (s2 / strike-01

                                                :mod (c4 / country
                                                      :name (n5 / name
                                                            :op1 "America"))
                                                :mod (a5 / any))
                                          :op2 (a6 / asset
